Desc.entry: Private tennis club with 7 artificial grass courts of which 2 are floodlit. The surfaces of all courts are synthetic grass. Two professional coaches are available for coaching. Teams play in the Sheffield and District Leagues together with a Mens' and Ladies' Teams in the Yorkshire District. Children's coaching and soft tennis also available. Recently opened a mini court for children aged 5 years and over to play short tennis with a feather lite soft ball. Provides fun for this age range and fosters ball skills at an early age.

ContactName.entry: Mr R A Coghill, Honorary Secretary
